For consistency and clarity, I've renamed the order.xml setting
at /loggers/crawl-statistics/@interval  to 'interval-seconds'.

I've adjusted the code and changed the order.xml that serves as
the template for the web UI, but keep this change in mind if
your crawls using other orders don't seem to report progress
as expected.

- Gordon
